news.title: San Francisco declares homeless tent city a health hazard
news.description: An inspection found that people in tents along Division Street are living among garbage and other unsanitary conditions

news.title: International Space Station astronauts give 1.5 tons of trash the boot
news.description: A pair of NASA astronauts released a capsule loaded with 1.5 tons of trash Friday as the space station soared over Bolivia

news.title: Former governor Dukakis still battling litter
news.description: Michael Dukakis, the 1988 Democratic presidential nominee is famous for picking up litter on his morning walks

news.title: Trash left by December floods still littering river city
news.description: Floodwater from the Christmas rains that drenched Washington has subsided, but it left behind trash that still litters the banks of Decaturâ€™s parks near waterways

news.title: Feds: Colorado man gets 6 months for massive littering near Telluride
news.description: Benjamin Yoho dumped the debris in the Uncompahgre National Forest

news.title: Great Pacific Garbage Patch
news.description: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch is a collection of marine debris in the North Pacific Ocean

news.title: Ocean Trash: 5.25 Trillion pieces and counting, but big questions still remain
news.description: The numbers add up to trouble for the oceans, wildlife, and us, but scientists are struggling to understand how

news.title: Sea Turtles fight for survival in oceans of plastic trash
news.description: A risk analysis shows sea turtles off the coast of the eastern USA, Australia, and South Africa are at the highest risk of ingesting wayward plastic trash that has been dumped into the ocean

news.title: How much are we trashing our oceans?
news.description: A worldwide analysis of the way human trash affects the well-being of the ocean

news.title: Landfill fire threatens nuclear waste site outside St. Louis
news.description: Landfill fires are pretty common, but this one is different. It's only about a thousand feet away from nearly 9,000 tons of nuclear waste
